serverMessage.CmdUtil-Error.参数验证.属性ManagerChat为空: Parameter instance not properly initialized: missing ManagerChat property

serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Error.InjectableClass: InjectableClasses did not correctly inject the ModConfig property

serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Error.对局结束.没有有效开局数据: No valid match start data found when the game ended
serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Error.无法通过PlayerId获取玩: Unable to retrieve player account ID via playerId

serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Info.对局结束.已记录: Match end recorded: {{ServerId}}, Session: {{Session}}, Results: {{ Result: {{ResultsResult}}, ExitName: {{ResultsExitName}}, PlayTime: {{ResultsPlayTime}} }}, LocationTransit: {{LocationTransit}}, Number of items taken out of the match: {{ItemsTakeOutCount}}

serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.记录数据库文件夹不存在: Record database folder path could not be properly obtained, please ensure the `db\records` folder path exists

serverMessage.RecordManager-Warn.保存数据库时账户Id不一致: Account ID inconsistency detected when saving record database, database account ID has been modified from {{OldId}} to {{NewId}}
serverMessage.RecordManager-Warn.创建记录时存在缓存->归档缓存: Player {{PlayerId}}'s record cache was not empty when creating record, cache has been directly archived

translations.Cmd-Cls.Desc: Clear the chat dialog history. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Cls.已清除聊天记录: Cleared {{Count}} chat history entries. Takes effect after restarting the game client.
translations.Cmd-Cls.找不到聊天记录: Your chat history could not be found.
translations.Cmd-Help.Desc: Get help information for all commands. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Help.显示文本: Help Information (Parameters require key-value pairs, e.g., "list index 1"; square brackets indicate optional parameters; commands and parameters are case-insensitive):
translations.Cmd-Info.Desc: Use an index or serverId to get detailed match records (at least one parameter is required). Usage:
translations.Cmd-Info.本局击杀信息: {{VictimTime}} Eliminated {{VictimName}}(Level: {{VictimLevel}} Faction: {{VictimSide}} Role: {{VictimRole}}) from {{VictimDistance}}m away using {{WeaponName}}, hit {{BodyPart}}.
translations.Cmd-Items.Desc: Use an index to get detailed item information for a specific match record. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Items.物品表头: Item Name   Unit Price(rub) * Multiplier = Total Value(rub)   Item Description
translations.Cmd-List.Desc: Get all your eligible match history records. Usage:
translations.Cmd-List.历史战绩.表头: - Index | PlayerGroup | MapName | PreRaidValue | GrossProfit | Combat Losses | Play Time | KillCount | Result
translations.Cmd-List.历史战绩.表头长度不一致: Please check whether the header is correctly separated by '|'. The current number of separated headers is: {{ActualColCount}}, and the theoretical column count is: {{TheoreticalColCount}}.
translations.Cmd-List.没有任何历史战绩: You have no historical match records. Please play at least one match before querying.
translations.Cmd-List.没有找到指定页的记录: No records found from entry {{StartIndex}} to {{EndIndex}}. Supported index range: {{IndexRange}}
translations.Cmd-List.获取对局结果信息时出错: An error occurred while attempting to retrieve match result information from the local database.
translations.Cmd-Price.Desc: Used to view item prices. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Price.Error.无效的tpl: Invalid template ID: {{TplId}}. Please check if the parameter is correct.
translations.Cmd-Price.Error.缺少参数: Missing all parameters when using the price command. Please refer to the help command's instructions and provide at least one parameter.
translations.Cmd-Price.name结果: - Item Name: {{Name}} Item Template ID: {{TplId}} Item Market Average Unit Price: {{AvgPrice}}rub Dynamic Price: {{DynPrice}}rub Handbook Price: {{HandbookPrice}}rub Similarity Score: {{Similarity}}
translations.Cmd-Price.tpl结果: Item Template ID: {{TplId}} Item Name: {{Name}} Item Market Average Unit Price: {{AvgPrice}}rub Dynamic Price: {{DynPrice}}rub Handbook Price: {{HandbookPrice}}rub
translations.Cmd-参数简述.Items.mode:
Supports "change" (default) or "all", case-insensitive.
'change' only shows items that were added, lost, or changed; 'all' is similar to the old version, showing items brought in and taken out.
translations.Cmd-参数简述.limit: Specify the maximum number of entries to display per page
translations.Cmd-参数简述.name: Item Name
translations.Cmd-参数简述.page: Specify the page number to display
translations.Cmd-参数简述.top: Specifies the maximum number of search results, at least 10.
translations.Record-元数据.入场信息: Raid Equipment: {{EquipmentValue}}rub, Secure Container Value: {{SecuredValue}}rub, Total Value Brought In: {{PreRaidValue}}rub
translations.Record-元数据.地图与存活时间: Map: {{MapName}} Survival Time: {{PlayTime}} Kill Count: {{KillCount}} Headshot Kill Rate: {{HeadshotKillRate}}
translations.Record-元数据.退出信息: Value Extracted: {{GrossProfit}}rub, Combat Losses: {{CombatLosses}}rub, Net Profit: {{NetProfit}}rub
